## What Infosec cares about {autoslide=30000}

{{< motion-canvas ./animations/src/infosec-triad.js fullscreen auto=false loop=false >}}


## Risk: data leakage

- Personally identifiable information (PII)
- Confidential customer information
- Trade secrets
- Passwords, credentials and keys

- Exposing data to individuals without permissions

## Risk: updating data without due testing

- Writing back to production systems
- Creating data silos

## Risk: exposure via LLM provider

- training on your data
- and resultant possible data leakage via the model



# Solutions {autoslide=15000}

{{< motion-canvas ./animations/src/hexagons.js background fullscreen loop=false >}}

## Consider: {autoslide=60000}

- Authorisation
  - Minimal permissions
  - Limit audience to trusted users

<br/>

- Data security
  - Hosted models with guardrails

<br/>

- Scoped permissions
  - Do not write back to production systems
  - Unless you've tested extensively


# Don't ask for forgiveness!

- Start the conversation as early as possible
- Your InfoSec team will attempt to enable you
